profile.deleteconfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your profile? All your data will be permanently lost and appointments booked after 3 days will be deleted!
register.agree1: I declare that I have read and understood the contents of the data management information (which you can access by clicking here), I agree with its content, and I voluntarily consent to the data management.
register.agree2: I further declare that I will provide my data on the website, after reading the data management information, voluntarily and in the manner provided by the program.
message.success.activation: Activation successful, you can now log in!
message.unsuccess.chart.notfound: Failed to get dates or no results! Please try again later.
message.unsuccess.chart.error: Failed to get dates, an unexpected error occurred! Please try again later.

message.unsuccess.delete: Delete failed! Please try again later.
message.unsuccess.users.load: Failed to retrieve users! Please try again later.
message.success.recoverpassword: Successful password change, you can log in with the new password!
message.success.register: Please confirm your registration by clicking on the link in the email you sent!

message.unsuccess.reservation.reserve: Unsuccessful date booking! Please try again later.
